xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
confluencepro.panel.title=Confluence Migrator Pro confluencepro.extension.name=Confluence Migrator Pro
confluencepro.extension.missingLicense=The application is running in trial mode. In order to unlock the full capabilities please obtain a license from the {0}. confluencepro.extension.missingLicense.label=administration section confluencepro.extension.notMainWiki=Confluence Migrations are managed on the {0}. confluencepro.extension.notMainWiki.link.label=main wiki
confluencepro.zippicker.title=Select a confluence package to start the migration confluencepro.zippicker.placeholder=Pick a confluence export package... confluencepro.zippicker.button.submit=Migrate
confluencepro.norights=Only the admin can perform the migration. confluencepro.upload.submit=Upload new package confluencepro.upload.cancel=Cancel selection
confluencepro.packages.title=Step 2 - Choose an export package confluencepro.packages.hint=To start a migration, select an existing package or upload a new one. confluencepro.packages.serverPath={0}Select from server{1} confluencepro.packages.prefillUsing=For parameter values, prefill using: confluencepro.packages.prefillUsingDefaults=the default parameter values confluencepro.packages.prefillUsingLast=the parameter values used during the last migration confluencepro.packages.prefillUsingSpecified=the parameter values used during the following migration: confluencepro.packages.rememberPrefillConfig=Remember this choice for next time
confluencepro.migrations.title=Your migrations
confluencepro.prerequisites.title=Step 1 - Prerequisites confluencepro.prerequisites.hint=It is highly recommended to have all the prerequisites satisfied before proceeding with the migration. confluencepro.prerequisites.completed=completed confluencepro.prerequisites.incomplete=not completed confluencepro.prerequisites.memory=Set -Xmx ({0}) and -Xms ({1}) to at least half the memory of the machine ({2} for {3} RAM). confluencepro.prerequisites.notifications=Deactivate notifications in "xwiki.properties": "notifications.enabled" and "notifications.emails.enabled" (optional). confluencepro.prerequisites.userNotifications=Deactivate notifications on your own profile ("never" for automatic page watching, disable page notifications). confluencepro.prerequisites.userNotificationsCleanup=Clean the Notification Preferences (optional). confluencepro.prerequisites.solr=To minimize migration duration, we recommend to ensure that the Solr queue is empty before starting the migration. Check the Solr queue size in the Wiki Administration, Solr Search Section (optional). confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.docMoved=Deactivate Document Moved Listener (important for large spaces). confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.automaticWatch=Deactivate Automatic Watch Mode Listener (important for large spaces). confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.liveNotification=Deactivate Live Notification Email Listener (important for large spaces).
confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.success=Migration complete. See your report below. confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.died=This migration died. This can happen if XWiki was restarted during the migration, or if something wrong happened. confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.errored=A serious error prevented the migration from finishing. Please see the logs for details. confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.canceled=This migration was canceled. confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.title=The {0} imported pages from the {2} selected Confluence space(s) ({1} revisions) confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.onespace.title=The {0} imported pages ({1} revisions) confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.title=Macros found during the migration confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.supported=Supported macros confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.notSupported=Unsupported macros confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.supported.icon.title=These macros are present in the XWiki instance and are either supported or partially supported. confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.notSupported.icon.title=These macros are not present in the XWiki Instance but might be installable through the Extension Manager. confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.notSupported.noMacros=There were no unsupported macros detected during the migration. confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.supported.noMacros=There were no supported macros detected during the migration. confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.link=See the list of all confluence macros and their XWiki counterpart. confluencepro.migration.raport.logs.title=The logs of the migration confluencepro.migration.raport.viewall.button=View all migrations confluencepro.migration.raport.viewtext=View in text format confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.skipped.title={0} page(s) have encountered critical issues during the import confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefs.title={0} page(s) contain references to missing pages confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefs.info=This usually means that these pages link to pages from other spaces, and the Confluence package you used doesn't contain those spaces. Confluence reference were used to work around this issue. To avoid this, import the target spaces, and then reimport this one. We advice converting these Confluence references to proper links when the targeted pages are available. confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.brokenLinks.title={0} page(s) have encountered link issues during the import confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.brokenLinks.info=This usually means that these pages link to pages from other spaces, and the Confluence package you used doesn't contain those spaces. Newer migrations will issue confluence reference to work around this issue. To avoid this, import the target spaces, and then reimport this one. We advice fixing these broken links when the targeted pages are available. confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.title=Missing users and groups confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.collisions.title=Reference collisions confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.collisions.info=The following references relate to several Confluence page titles. This means that those titles were translated to the same reference, and that the related pages overwrote each others during the migration confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.info=These users and groups appear in rights imported from the Confluence package, but were not present the wiki in which Confluence Migrator Pro ran. This is only an issue if you expected all the users and groups to exist in this wiki before migrating this content. confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.users=Missing users: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.groups=Missing groups: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.done.title={0} page(s) have encountered issues during the import confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.other.title=Other issue were encountered during the import confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefs.list=List of targeted but missing pages confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefids.list=List of targeted but missing page IDs: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.brokenLinks.list=List of pages targeted by potentially broken links confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameters.title=There are {0} unhandled macro parameters or parameter values confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameters.info=Unhandled parameter warnings: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameterValues.info=Unhandled parameter values warnings: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameters.list=The unhandled parameter (values), per macro confluencepro.migration.raport.renamingSpace=(original space key: {0}) confluencepro.migration.raport.macroName=Macro confluencepro.migration.raport.parameterName=Parameter confluencepro.migration.raport.parameterValues=Value(s) confluencepro.migration.raport.confluencespace=Confluence space key confluencepro.migration.raport.pageTitle=Page title confluencepro.migration.raport.pleaseenablejs=Please enable JavaScript to see the logs confluencepro.migration.raport.displayFullLog=Display full logs confluencepro.migration.title.label=Set the title of the migration confluencepro.migration.source.title=Set the source package of the migration confluencepro.migration.title.placeholder=Type the desired title... confluencepro.migration.missingLicense=As part of a trial, you can migrate one space per migration. In order to unlock the full capabilities please obtain a license.
confluencepro.migration.migratepropsdocsave=Migrated JSON properties to attachments confluencepro.migration.propertiessuccessfullymigrated=Migrated properties to attachments. confluencepro.migration.nopropertiestomigrate=No properties to migrate.
confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.title=Migration confluencepro.migration.livetable._actions=Actions confluencepro.migration.livetable._actions.select=Select package confluencepro.migration.livetable.job_status=Migration status confluencepro.migration.livetable.executed=Is executed? confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.date=Date confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.author=Creator confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.running=Running confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.canceled=Canceled confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.died=Died confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.errored=Errored confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.none=Not started confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.waiting=Waiting confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.done=Done
confluencepro.migration.popup.title=Insert the title of the migration confluencepro.migration.popup.placeholder=Type the migration title... confluencepro.migration.popup.startMigration=Start migration
confluencepro.macros.title=Imported macros confluencepro.macros.link=For more information about supported and unsupported macros, please visit our dedicated page. confluencepro.macros.livetable.name=Macro name confluencepro.macros.livetable.occurrences=Occurrences confluencepro.macros.livetable.pages=Present in pages confluencepro.macros.livetable.supported=Is supported?
confluencepro.macros.pages.title=The pages where "{0}" macro is present confluencepro.macros.pages.noMacro=No macro selected. confluencepro.macros.pages.missingData=There is no data on this macro.
confluencepro.job.question.title=Select the Confluence spaces you want to import. confluencepro.job.question.additionalInfo.documentsCount=Documents: confluencepro.job.question.additionalInfo.attachmentsCount=Attachments: confluencepro.job.question.selectAll=Select all confluencepro.job.question.search.placeholder=Search for a space... confluencepro.job.question.showMore.message={0} more spaces available. confluencepro.job.question.showMore.link=Load more.. confluencepro.job.interrupt.button=Interrupt confluencepro.job.status.readingPackage=Importing the Confluence package. This may take a while.. confluencepro.job.status.runningJob=Your pages are being imported and moved into the correct location. This may take a while.. confluencepro.job.question.advanced.link=Advanced migration options confluencepro.job.question.advanced.input=Properties of the input filter stream (Confluence XML) confluencepro.job.question.advanced.output=Properties of the output filter stream (XWiki instance) confluencepro.job.question.advanced.source=The source package confluencepro.job.question.advanced.source.description=The path to the package that will be migrated e.g. file://home/user/Downloads/confluencePackage.zip. You can also give the path to a directory containing the unzipped package (an entity.xml file and an attachments folder). confluencepro.job.general.title=General parameters confluencepro.job.skipquestions.question.title=Skip the space selection screen confluencepro.job.skipquestions.question.hint=If you check this, all spaces will be imported. Note: the screen will always be skipped if the Confluence package contains only one space, regardless the value of this parameter. confluencepro.job.onlyrights.question.hint=If you have already migrated your content and wish to import Confluence rights without modifying the content, you can do so setting this option to "true". confluencepro.job.onlyrights.warning=If you set this field to true, options in the next section will be ignored (because the default instance output filter stream is replaced with a custom one). confluencepro.job.onlyrights.question.title=Only import rights confluencepro.job.onlyattachments.question.hint=If you have already migrated your content and wish to import attachments (and attachment history) without modifying the content, you can do so setting this option to "true". Existing attachments won't be replaced. Note: make sure to import history if you want to import the attachment history. confluencepro.job.onlyattachments.question.title=Only import attachments confluencepro.job.linkmapping.title=Link Mapping confluencepro.job.linkmapping.description=Link Mapping lets the migrator collect information about spaces and documents as Confluence packages are analysed in order to produce the right links when pages link to other pages that are not in the same Confluence export package (for instance when using space exports). confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.title=Update link mapping confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.hint=Save information about documents in this package so links to these documents in migrations will work. This includes documents that are not in the spaces selected for import. You can disable this behavior by setting this to false. confluencepro.job.onlylinkmapping.question.title=Only build link mapping confluencepro.job.onlylinkmapping.question.hint=Set this to true if this migration should exclusively be used for building link mapping. No spaces will be imported. confluencepro.job.linkmapping.title=Link Mapping confluencepro.job.linkmapping.description=Link Mapping lets the migrator collect information about spaces and documents as Confluence packages are analysed in order to produce the right links when pages link to other pages that are not in the same Confluence export package (for instance when using space exports). confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.title=Update link mapping confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.hint=Save information about documents in this package so links to these documents in migrations will work. This includes documents that are not in the spaces selected for import. You can disable this behavior by setting this to false. confluencepro.job.emptyActionsToCheckboxes.question.title=Migrate empty action items to checkboxes confluencepro.job.emptyActionsToCheckboxes.question.hint=This will migrate all empty tasks (ac:task-body</ac:task-body) to checkboxes. This will mean that if an action item has no description, even if it has an assignee or due date, it will be migrated to a checkbox. confluencepro.job.actionsToCheckboxes.question.title=Migrate all action items to checkboxes confluencepro.job.actionsToCheckboxes.question.hint=This will convert all Confluence action items into checkboxes. ac:task-bodymy task description</ac:task-body should be migrated to the checkboxes's content.
